column5: For those who like Nine Inch Nails You can officially download a DRM-Free album -The Slip  http://theslip.nin.com/
Must be a really thick photo album....since you need to have 9" nails to hold it shut.
NICE!!  Thanks for the heads up!!
sheesh, I thought someone was giving away free eavestrough spikes  Maybe I'm just gettin old
